it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net

Class Node

  • java.lang.Object
    • it.unipr.netsec.ipstack.net.Node
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    Ip4Node, Ip6Node, P1Node

    public class Node
extends java.lang.Object
    A generic network node. It may have one or more network interfaces and one routing function.
    It may act either as terminal node or intermediate relay node, depending on the value of the 'forwarding' attribute.

    Incoming packets are processed by two different methods depending whether the incoming packet is for this node or not.
